hadith.text: Nafi, reported that Ibn Umar (Allah be pleased with them) used to rent the land, and that he was conveyed the hadith transmitted on the authority of Rafi b. Khadij. He (the narrator) said:He then went to him along with me. He (Rafi) narrated from some of his uncles in which it was mentioned that Allah's Apostle (ï·º) forbade the renting of land. Ibn 'Umar (Allah be pleased with them) then abandoned this practice of renting
